newsitem.title: USA: Carpenter comfortable with Q2 estimate.
newsitem.headline: Carpenter comfortable with Q2 estimate.

text.p: Carpenter Technology Corp is comfortable with Wall Street's consensus earnings estimate of $0.83 per share for the fiscal 1997 second quarter ending December 31, said Robert Cardy, Carpenter's chairman, president and chief executive officer, in an interview with Reuters Thursday.

Carpenter earned $0.69 per share in the second quarter of fiscal 1996. The company is the largest U.S. producer of high-performance alloys and specialty steel products in long product form including bar, rod and wire.
